short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,et,fa,fi,fil,gu,: Extract posts and feeds of user profile and company page on LinkedIn into CSV file.

short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Extract posts and feeds of user profile, groups and company page on LinkedIn into CSV file.
short.es,es_419: Extraer publicaciones y feeds del perfil de usuario y la p√°gina de la empresa en LinkedIn en un archivo CSV.
short.fr: Extraire les publications et les flux du profil utilisateur et de la page d'entreprise sur LinkedIn dans un fichier CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Easily export the posts / feeds of any LinkedIn profile and company page

Change log
v2.0.0 fixed extract feed issue.

Explore our LinkedIn tool suite by navigating to the tools menu.
- Search Exporter - Easily export search results to a CSV file
- Sales Nav Exporter - Extract leads and accounts from Sales Navigator
- Group Exporter - Gather members information on groups
- Vote Exporter - Download the results of your poll votes
